nodes.text: Jason Temujin Minor is an American artist, writer, comic book and comic book artist. In the 2000s, Minor worked for Sony Online Entertainment on their Massively Multiplayer Online game, Star Wars Galaxies. He became the lead character artist on the Star Wars Galaxies: Rage of the Wookiees game expansion and he took over as Art Director of the Live Team in 2004. Jason Temujin Minor is currently working for BioWare as the lead character artist on their MMO, Star Wars: The Old Republic.
